title: Masterpiece19
description:
The Art Institute of Chicago’s gala has been a fixture of Chicago’s social calendar, attracting civic leaders and philanthropists since the much-celebrated inaugural Masterpiece Ball in 1952.

Funds raised from Masterpiece19 will support the museum’s mission to inspire and educate our community and worldwide audiences.

7:00 Cocktail Reception

8:00 Dinner

9:30 After-Party featuring music industry legends The Temptations

Complimentary valet parking

Sponsorship Levels 
Host Committee: $100,000 
Benefactor: $50,000 
Patron: $25,000 
Individual tickets: $1,500 each

For more information or to purchase tickets, contact masterpiece@artic.edu or Roberta Neuhausler in the Special Events office at (312) 443-3631.
